name: Dotsavvy
tag_list: digital, marketing, agency, kenya, nairobi, africa, mobile, apps, applications, social-media, advertising, ads
overview: Dotsavvy is one of the most experienced and successful digital marketing agencies in East Africa. Established in 2002, Dotsavvy has carried out hundreds of digital marketing engagements to-date. Dotsavvy is backed by the resources and expertise to bring the best in digital marketing strategy, technology, creative design and media execution for all clients. As of this writing, Dotsavvy employs 15 full-time professionals with a collective experience of many decades in digital marketing, application development, advertising and management consulting at leading organizations. Dotsavvy is organized to work on a client-centered basis. It offers the dual benefits of individual attention and team collaboration. Unlike a traditional Ad Agency, Dotsavvy has all the required competencies to conceptualize, develop, deploy and manage the highest quality digital marketing offerings.

offices.address1: Suite 25, Upper Hill Duplex Apartments, Upper Hill Road
